topics.body: I really wish we had a minecraft server.  Equestriaprevails has a server, but it's white list only.  Bukkit and disabling firespread stops *most* griefers.

topics.body: You could always contact EqP, Clop, or Feral. Shouldn't be difficult.

topics.body: So I played bioshock 1 again.  I forgot how good this game is.  The quotes are pretty damn good too.  I forgot completely about "A man chooses, a slave obeys".
topics.author: 38b55cdf63616403d7560600

topics.body:
"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/52e0d7c2636872251e410000#post_52e0d7c2636872251e410000
Ohhhh Bioshock one was a really good game.

I'm glad in the DLC for Bioshock Infinite they are bringing back Rapture.
topics.author: 50c204917f123b31440000a5

topics.body:
"@Number1pegasus":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/52e0db5f636872253e1a0300#post_52e0db5f636872253e1a0300
Personally I like bioshock 1 more than infinite.  They're both good games.  Personally I like the speeches from bioshock 1 more.  The speeches about, "A man chooses, a slave obeys" and pretty much everything about ryan and such is so good.  Also the slogan of, "No gods or kings.  Only man" are so good.

In infinite you're pretty much going, "Fuck comstock" throughout the game.  In bioshock one Ryan is a *WAY* better speaker than comstock.
topics.author: 38b55cdf63616403d7560600

topics.body:
"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/52e0df4b63687263cc000000#post_52e0df4b63687263cc000000
Yeah I can agree with that, I did feel more obligated to kill the bad guy in Infinite while in Bioshock 1 you felt more confused and waiting to see what happens next.

Also Infinite ending like many people said just hurt your brain while Bioshock one had you feeling betrayed and jaw dropping at the same time.
topics.author: 50c204917f123b31440000a5

topics.body:
I thought Bioshock 1 was kinda good but not "fantastic". I did like it enough to save all the little sisters but that's about it.
Now Fallout 3, that's an amazing game right thar.

Off topic, but I love how Attack on Titan starts it's episodes with a recap of everything that happened up till that point. Eventually it's just gonna go;

[spoiler]
Year 845, Colossal Titan appears
Shit goes down
Year 850, it appears again
More shit goes down
Eren is a Titan
Humanity grows a pair
Reclaim Wall Rose
Levi never smiles
Female Titan
Actually Annie
[/spoiler]
SHIET LETâ€™S START THE PARTY

topics.body:
You know, I always thought that "wearing your boyfriend's shirt is comforting" trope was romance novel bullshit, but now that I'm actually doing it, hey, it's pretty nice.

Man t-shirts are wide and comfy. Unlike cut girl ones, which like to push out your cleavage and give you child birthing hips.
